review: I got it out of the box, plugged it in and got it connected to the internet. Had some issues with the connection until I added the extension onto it. But it only worked for a few hours before the network connection weakened. It says the network strength is very good but nothing will load, not even the home page. All of my other WiFi devices are working fine. I have only had this device for a day and I've already had to search the internet for troubleshooting. I'm not very impressed with it at all. Is there anything that can be done about it not loading anything. If there isn't anything that can be done, I will be returning it. I did like it for the few hours it was working.
author: Michael Horning

review: Recently subscribed to Amazon Prime and wanted to be able to watch the videos on the TV. It was pretty easy to set up although the directions could have been a little better. The confusing part was how to work it with a cable box. Googled and found helpful info. Works fine and was reasonably priced.
